data.name: Bugvasion TD
data.detailed_description:
Bugvasion TD aims to mix the Micro Machines looks with the tower defense genre bringing colorful levels and quirky enemies to your screen. However this is not just a build-your-towers-and-sit-back kind of experience, you have to actively maintain your towers, use special abilities and attacks, combine your tools to defend your home room by room from the alien possessed bugs.



Features:
- Defend your house room by room, use the surroundings to your advantage
- 20 colorful and cranky levels all across the house from the attic to the basement
- Combine special attacks and tower defenses - use your arsenal wisely and try to combine attacks with whatever you find on the maps, might be worth a try

- Skill tree - use your tech points to unlock and upgrade towers, special attacks
- Humorous storyline with quirky characters
- The Event System - brings randomized waves with different features, you’ll never know what comes next, it can be helpful or it can put you in disadvantage, it all comes down to luck.


Maintain your towers - keep a close tab on your towers and replace canisters, batteries to keep them running


Use the environment - there are several interactive objects around the maps that you can use for your advantage such as glue tubes, ZEP dispensers, hot sauce bottles


Combine your tools - try settings things on fire or electrocuting them, you never know what might start a chain reaction


Unlock new technologies - collect tech points by completing levels and spend them to unlock new towers and special attacks

Collect badges, achievements and points to rule the leaderboards

data.short_description: Alien possessed bugs are attacking your home, stop them by any means with your arsenal of home made bug repellents and insect crushers, think fast, act fast, because the bugvasion is imminent in this classic tower defense strategy game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Hungarian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“I loved the environment, graphics and the interplay between the main characters between missions.”
8/10 – Higher Plain Games

“Its key differentiator is that plays out like a cross between Honey I Shrunk the Kids and Mars Attacks.”
7/10 – Critical Hit Gaming

“It looks absolutely amazing.”
8/10 – LifeIsXbox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Steam OS
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics/AMD Radeon 8500 Or Later Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Steam OS
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics/AMD Radeon 8500 Or Later Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
